means: 改善，改进，提高( improve的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Conditions for the poor in Los Angeles have not improved.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛杉矶穷人的境况仍未得到改善。

sentence.Network_en: Teachers inform me that Tracey's behaviour has improved no end.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师们告诉我特雷西的行为大有改善。

sentence.Network_en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentence.Network_cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

entry.def: If something improves or if you improve it, it gets better.

example.ex: Both the texture and condition of your hair should improve...
example.tran: 你头发的发质与健康状况都应改善。

example.ex: The weather is beginning to improve...

entry.def: If a skill you have improves or you improve a skill, you get better at it.

example.ex: He said he was going to improve his football.
example.tran: 他说他要提高足球技术。

entry.def: If you improve after an illness or an injury, your health gets better or you get stronger.

example.ex: He had improved so much the doctor had cut his dosage.
example.tran: 他康复很快,医生已减少了用药剂量。

entry.def: If you improve on a previous achievement of your own or of someone else, you achieve a better standard or result.

example.ex: We need to improve on our performance against France.
example.tran: 我们需要比对阵法国队时表现得更好。

means.word_mean: 1. made more desirable or valuable or profitable; especially made ready for use or marketing;

sentences.sentence: "new houses are springing up on an improved tract of land near the river"

means.word_mean: 2. become or made better in quality;
3. (of land) made ready for development or agriculture by clearing of trees and brush;

auth_sentence.content: That improved our lives in a very tiny way.
auth_sentence.res_content: That improved our lives in a very tiny way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That improved our lives in a very tiny way.

auth_sentence.content: I think the president has improved since the election.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think the president has improved since the election.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think the president has improved since the election.

auth_sentence.content: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.

Sentence.sentence: Farmington, Utah, is a more pleasant community since a local girls' 4-H club improved Main Street.
They need to be further improved
Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%.
At first, the doctors weren't sure, but she's really improved.
Land Usage: Over the last five decades, improved farming techniques and technologies have helped to significantly increase crop yields along with a 12% expansion of farmed land use
Rising population combined with improved nutrition standards and shifting dietary preferences will exert pressure for increases in global food supply.
